description:
An essential introduction to Google Adwords from a world class PPC consultant.


This AdWords course is the introduction to David Black's popular course Google AdWords Business Training also available on Udemy.

It has been specifically designed for business owners who want to:

  • Learn more about how your business can use simple techniques to significantly improve the performance of their campaigns
  • Understand how to research, develop & manage profitable AdWords campaigns
  • Know how to effectively monitor and optimise your campaigns


ABOUT THE AUTHOR

David Black is one of the UK's most experienced Certified Google AdWords trainer & consultant, with over 6 years of experience helping hundreds of businesses to build and manage more profitable PPC campaigns.

If you have any questions, or would like some AdWords advice, please feel free to get in touch.
title: Learn AdWords in 60 Minutes
